alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Kaufman; Navarro; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 10:02PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Kaufman, Van Zandt, Henderson and northeastern Navarro Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 1002 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Caddo Mills to near Kerens. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Corsicana, Terrell, Forney, Athens, Kaufman, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Wills Point, Mabank, Crandall, Malakoff, Tool, Kerens, Talty, Seven Points, Edgewood, Kemp, Eustace, Trinidad and Angus. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 489 and 533. Interstate 45 between mile markers 224 and 234. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for central Texas.
